entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlnsDefinitonAttribute is not supported for "this" assembly #28150
  • [iOS] Label LinebreakMode (TailTruncation) for FormattedText does't work in CollectionView after scroll #28147
    Backlog
  • Issue with .Net Maui. ShellContent OnSelected property doesnt exist. #28142
  • Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28140
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28135
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Trackpad horizontal scroll permanently locks scrolling axis in MAUI WebView #28131
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28130
    .NET 9 SR5

Closed

  • Navigation turns off Android "Immersive mode" #28108
  • Maui Android app update from Play store is crashing on startup #28146
  • Border control performance issue #20734
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    Backlog
  • ImageButton Padding resizes image down unexpectedly even when there is available space #22521
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [9.0] [Windows] [Regression] WebView control fails to display content, resulting in a blank screen. #27133
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Not showing ,net maui templates #28057
  • Image Resizing issue on MAUI android app #28129
  • Update SkiaSharp in maui to the latest 3.x stable to get the security fixes #26099
    .NET 9 SR5
  • ShellTitleView Command Binding not working #12352
  • Keyboard Does Not Close on Search Button Press in SearchBar Control #28110
  • IOS: PlatformView cannot be null here (Microsoft.Maui.IEditor) #27872
  • HybridWebView can not load .js.map file. #27943

PullRequests

Created

  • Start shipping WorkloadDependencies.json #28149
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Publish VS workload zips #28145
  • 2025-3-3-docs-UiTesting.md-improvements #28143
    community ✨
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [Bindings SG] Filter out false positive Binding.Create matches #28138
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 4 #28137
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Blank Screen on navigating back to Previous Page #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #28132
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix broken/unreliable UI tests #28125
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area-drawing, community ✨, stale, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Optimize formatted labels #28073
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Ignore for now obsoletes on iOS #28136
    platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView2 Items display issue when Header/Footer is resized on iOS #27076
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: TapGestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Make sure the Window is available #28013
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - fix #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Fix 24214 [Windows] IconImageSource as StreamImageSource of ContentPage in TabbedPage doesn't display #28127
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Trimming][PoC] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2792.45` to `1.0.2903.40` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 4 #28105
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Move to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #28084
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28093
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    community ✨
  • WinUI ContentDialog: respect dynamic theme changes #28126
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-dialog
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] Shell.AutoResizeTabBarIcons #28128
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using swipe gesture #27186
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
